name: Spring Break Cabin
description:
Spring Break Cabin is a third person screamer:

Scream your terror to fight the monsters of the evil spring break cabin.

This game was made during the Big Game Jam and the brussels fantastic film festival at Point Culture in Brussels, where the theme was "B-Movies from Brussels (No zombies allowed !)".

My goal for this game was to translate the cool BIFFF(brussels internationnal fantastic film festival) vibe where everybody scream during the movies.

This game was made with construct 2

Have fun!

Olivier Bogarts
